test.name: Deve retornar que já existe o parceiro

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3333/partners path_url=/partners headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'auth_user': 'qa', 'auth_password': 'ninja', 'Content-Length': '121'} body=b'{"name": "Pizzas Papito2", "email": "contato2@papito.com.br", "whatsapp": "61123456789", "business": "Conveni\\u00eancia"}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
